alert.note: Alert for Camden; Chowan; Eastern Currituck; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 21 at 4:41AM EST until January 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of eastern and southeast Virginia and northeast North Carolina. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 AM EST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Chowan; Eastern Currituck; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck
